alert.note: Alert for Adams (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gettysburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cashtown, Aspers, Orrtanna, Biglerville, Arendtsville, Bendersville and McKnightstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
